name: Web-Mail Madness
description:
[ DOWNLOAD LINK BELOW ]

A game by NPJarcade, written in two days for MiniJam123

- CONTROLS -

LEFT CLICK (hold) - spin a web

HOLD RIGHT (hold) - destroy web / speed boost

ESC - close game

- INFO -

A small web-themed game for MiniJam123

Limitation: THERE IS NO GROUND!

In Web-Mail Madness, you are a tiny spider inside a computer.  Your goal is to deliver as many e-mails as possible! 

To reach the emails you'll need to spin webs to create new paths around the level. 

Webs can also be used as bridges to cross holes in the walls.

Use the speed boost to break webs.

Watch out for holes on the dodgy circuit-boards! 

- CREDITS -

Follow me on Twitter @NPJarcade

Programming, artwork and graphics by NPJarcade, UK, 2023.

SFX randomly generated using ChipTone - http://sfbgames.com/chiptone

Music created using Beepbox - http://www.beepbox.co
